data.title: State of Oregon: Safety & Resilience
data.text:
​Year​Major Milestone1993​​Portland General Electric announces it will permanently close Trojan​1995

​Removal of large components (4 steam generators and the pressurizer).​1996​Energy Facility Siting Council (EFSC) and Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) approval of the Decommissioning Plan.​1999​Approval of planned "independent spent fuel storage installation."​1999One-piece removal of the reactor vessel and its internal components (a first in the nation).​2000​ODOE and NRC review of the final survey plan.​2001​Start of final survey.​2003​All spent fuel transferred from the spent fuel pool to dry cask storage.​2004​Portland General Electric completed the final survey and submitted all results to ODOE and NRC for review.​2005​NRC and EFSC approval for releasing the site.
